pageProduct.name: Andrea Extra Strength Creme Bleach 42g + 28g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Lighten the most troublesome hair quickly and effectively without painful removal. Ideal for use on legs, arms, bikini line or for your tummy area.
Pack includes gentle Crème Bleach for the Body, gentle Crème Activator, Mixing Cup, Spatula and instructions.

Warnings

Always do a patch test. Do not apply on irritated or inflamed skin. If skin feels tender or irritated after application, remove immediately.
Hair bleaching products my slightly lighten or darken the skin tone of dark pigmented individuals in the area that was treated. Lightened or darkened skin will fade back to its natural shade within 72 hours.
Contains hydrogen peroxide. Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse immediately with lukewarm water if product comes into contact with eyes.
Always store in a cool dry place.
Wear suitable gloves.
Never use a metal dish or applicators with crème bleach.
Never use after a hot bath as open pores will increase sensitivity.
Don't store or re-use bleach mixture. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Extra Strength Crème Bleach: Water (Aqua), Hydrogen Peroxide, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Peg-20 Stearate, Stearic Acid,Mineral Oil, Methylparaben, Propylparaben. Extra Strength Crème Activator: Water (Aqua), Cetyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, Emulsifying WaxNf, Ammonium Hydroxide, Paraffinum Liquidum, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Methylparaben,Propylparaben.

Directions

1. Wash face with soap and water. Dry thoroughly.
2. Squeeze 2.5 inch strip of Crème Bleach into mixing cup.
3. Add Crème Activator. Blend the two thoroughly.
4. Using a spatula, apply to area to be lightened, making sure all hair is completely covered.
5. Do not rub.
6. Bleaching time varies with each individual. Wait 10 minutes.
7. Wash off small area with cool water to see if desired result is achieved.
8. If not lightened enough apply additional mixture to area checked, wait 5 more minutes.
9. Wash off thoroughly with cool water. Pat dry.
10. Throw away unused mixture.
